|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Global Sun Technology GL2454RT-QA0 :"GL2454RT-QA0-B10" and "VER V1.1" is silkscreened on the board of a C2 revision unit. On the DD-WRT [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Known_incompatible_devices known incompatible devices list]. ==Links of Interest== *{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model = DI-624|vs_id=6}}, [http://www.dlink.com/products/?tab=3&pid=DI-624&rev=DI-624_revC Support page] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Stock firmware=== ''' di624_revC_firmware_276.bin''' (md5: d863d2b32cdd791bee6453639a8774d4) - compressed ARJ file ('''NML.MEM'''), '''ThreadX''' based, '''AP3X-CUS28''' HW string :'''ThreadX''' version string - '''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0 *''' ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
